title: The Lurid Lady Lockport
description: A LOVELY LEGACY What a devilish trick his uncle had played! Kevin Rawlings had inherited the title of Earl and a country estate to go with it. But there would be no money, according to the will, until Kevin married his uncle's illegitimate daughter Gilly -- a kitchen maid on the estate! The new Earl quickly learned that Gilly was not the empty-headed waif he had imagined, but a spirited young beauty who would lead him a wild and merry chase. And, he was astonished to discover, his bold and passionate bride held the key not only to the family treasure, but to his heart as well.
author: Kasey Michaels
